html:
12.25.24  8:30 am   microtones?

      go right ahead. be my guest

12.25.24  7:02 am   why did you make a wedsite?

      because it was easier than emailing the content to everyone individually

12.25.24  4:31 am   would you be interested in rock climbing

      not right now

12.25.24  2:58 am   why do people put blankets in their bass drums

      if you ever tried to use a bass drum with nothing in it, then you'd understand

12.25.24  2:48 am   best burger toppings?

      how about a sesame seed

12.25.24  2:45 am   ....communism?

      "Communism is not a question."

12.25.24  12:17 am   What is an example of a good recipe

      going to go way out on a limb here and say H20

12.24.24  11:32 pm   how can i be less self-absorbed (not really in a narcissistic "im the best" way, more of an "im a neurotic overthinker" way) when everything i see and do and think and feel is necessarily being processed by my self

      you're doing fine. everyone else has to do that too

12.24.24  11:16 pm   is there beauty in suffering

      there is certainly a lot of beauty in response to suffering

12.24.24  10:52 pm   do you enjoy spreading blantant misinformation 

      i never even thought of doing that, but to be honest it sounds like a lot of fun. it seems like no one ever gets a chance to do it themselves, it's always "someone else" who's doing it

12.24.24  10:45 pm   What is a holiday? how is your holiday?

      if you don't even know what it is, what makes you think i have one

12.24.24  9:52 pm   this has definitely been asked before but how'd you get into making music and stuff

      it's sort of like when you are young and you see people *walking* and you're like HELLO my goodness that seems desperately useful

12.24.24  9:41 pm   What should I do when I'm bored?

      make the most important discovery of your life

12.24.24  9:37 pm   what's the most whimsical fact you know

      'there is no such thing as a whimsical fact'

12.24.24  8:59 pm   What's your favorite Ancient Greek word? Favorite Arabic word?

      i like them all equally

12.24.24  7:58 pm   what's your favourite editing software

      am i allowed to make my own

12.24.24  6:01 pm   How is Abraham Lincoln's assassination not a big deal in the news right now?

     because it was like 150 years ago

12.24.24  5:48 pm   whats the right amount of money?

      the square root of negative 1

12.24.24  4:06 pm   Is there anything you want to do where you must learn to work with someone else? Or are all your goals in life suitable for independent work?

      basically it's fun to do things with other people, but i can't do anything mind blowing. the art of blowing minds is too unstable to be co-authored. at least that's what i find. in fact, i don't even know if i can even do it by myself, but perhaps the problem is that i need to delude myself into thinking i can do it, and that becomes impossible with a co-author

12.24.24  3:23 pm   I wish that you would have written longer format responses, like on Cave's Red Hand Files. The blogpost format is very endearing.

      that's not the first time someone's wished i was someone else. sort of a tingly feeling

12.24.24  2:42 pm   if i'm at an airport, do the planes despawn until i see them

      not exactly

12.24.24  2:18 pm   What are you eating for dinner

      don't worry about it

12.24.24  1:57 pm   What do you do when you're not confident of what you're doing/making?

      i'm not sure

12.24.24  1:34 pm   why are organs so intimidating sounding?

      the huge ones are intimidating because of how huge they are. However it's still possible to play a huge organ in a friendly way, and to play a small organ in an intimidating way

12.24.24  11:39 am   Any of your assumptions get challenged recently?

      yes

12.24.24  9:30 am   any tips for starting a cult?

      the standard move here is don't call your own cult a cult. you say everyone else's cult is a cult, while you're the one offering the clear genuine truthful ideas

12.24.24  9:08 am   i just got 2 of your songs back to back on shuffle play did you do this

      i am a co-conspirator in this phenomenon just because of the fact that i've made more than 1 song

12.24.24  7:57 am   is it time to go out and do something?

      almost

12.24.24  3:40 am   In some places they claim that Santa lives in their country. Isn't it a bit disingenuous to exploit his image for nationalist propaganda?

      only if it's not true

12.24.24  3:09 am   let's play a game. i have a spicific object in mind, and you have to ask questions about it(ex: does it float on water?). i can only answer with yes/no. you get twenty tries.
the only slight worry i have is that this is not exactly a question, but i hope you'll understand. happy holidays bill!

      i am assuming it's a snow globe

12.24.24  2:56 am   What makes a name fitting?

      it's somehow a collaboration between the person and the person who gave the person the name. sometimes the name is given first before the person is the person, other times the person is a person and then gets the name based on the person they are. sometimes the name giver and name receiver are the same person, sometimes different. but when this transaction goes well, that's what we call a 'fit' in the name fitting biz

12.24.24  2:52 am   why is math everywhere

      that's the 'where' part. without the 'where', it all cancels out into a blinding abyss

12.24.24  2:40 am   is two friends on a beach a sequel to hi im steve

      in a way, yes. but the more direct sequel to hi i'm steve is certainly 'soap tips'

12.24.24  2:30 am   are you stupidly pedantic about grammar for no reason at all 

      no. actually now that i think about it i'm not totally sure what the word 'pedantic' means. i've never used it myself

12.24.24  1:15 am   What on earth is the Times New Roman (or other fonts that I didn't look at) "g" doing?

      harkening back

12.23.24  11:18 pm   Hey bill, it doesn't seem like you are going to release an LP or EP, but do you think you will invent a secret third thing called a QP and release that?

      wouldn't use acronyms like that. it's taken me my whole life to understand what LP and EP even means, i'd never subject anyone else to the same confusion

12.23.24  11:11 pm   Dose Rudolph's nose glow red, or white?

     i'm not sure

     And what did Santa use to guide his sleigh before he employed Rudolph?

      was unguided before

12.23.24  10:09 pm   There's this story I want to tell that's inspired by my friends and our life. So far I think it's a really strong story and I'm excited about it and I want to tell it. But I'm worried about portraying my inspiration I guess? Like part of me is worried about how they'll perceive how I perceive them? Do you get what I mean? I know logically they wont hate me or be mad at me or anything for simply writing made up stuff. And it's not like the characters or story is malicious or anything. It's just. You know. My feelings and thoughts are kind of driving it. Im nervous about it not living inside my head anymore. Umm I'm not really sure how to wrap this up into a coherent question. (sorry) I just wanted your advice since you seem good at drawing inspiration from literally anywhere and applying it in really cool ways.
:)

      whenever you get caught up in what your close personal friends or family might think of your work, you'll probably never be able to think clearly

12.23.24  10:05 pm   I love music. I was accepted into a high level orchestra, very strict and very experienced. I'm one of the least experienced players in it, so I have to work hard to keep up. It's freaking me out, I'm starting to get bad feelings whenever I play because I know it won't be up to standards. I still want to be very good, but I don't want to end up losing what I love about music or hate playing. Do you have any advice to not let the pressures get to me but still succeed? I want to make great music, but I don't want to sell my happiness for it. Thank you <3

      i'm not sure. as a player, almost all of my life experience has been in non-classical scenarios, which means the individual player has much more freedom over their exact individual behavior. the classical music player's lifestyle is very foreign to me. i do however relate more to the lifestyle of the classical composer

12.23.24  8:54 pm   Hope the holidays are going well for you.
Whenever asked about your favorite song (of yours), you answer that you'd rather make a new one to be your favorite. You've said that this is because you believe every song you make has to be made with the mentality that it'll be better than the song that came before it.
I wonder, though, by that logic, is the last song you'll make before retirement (if you plan to retire from making music at some point) the best song you'll ever make? Do you think you'd be satisfied with that song enough not to feel the urge to make another better one? If not, then does that mean that you'll probably keep making songs for the rest of your life and, therefore not really retire from music? 

      "i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite" says nothing about whether or not it will work. it just means to try. i mean if you aren't treating the one you're working on with favored status, then who's really flying the ship here, yknow

12.23.24  8:25 pm   what goes on in that square part in northern texas that the oklahoma panhandle goes around the top of

      Amarillo

12.23.24  8:05 pm   why did the quick brown fox jump over the lazy dog

      to help you test your keyboard in english. hopefully it's either more than 1 dog, or it happens in the present tense, otherwise you'd miss the S

12.23.24  7:34 pm   Why do so many of the states in the US end in the letter A? Like, almost half the states?

      A at the end of a word means 'place'

12.23.24  5:59 pm   What is your favorite piano chord ( genuine question)

      chords wouldn't even work if favor was not allowed to shift over time

12.23.24  5:42 pm   How to get a toothbrush out of a wall?

      just leave the toothbrush where it is and take the wall out of it

12.23.24  4:56 pm   How do I get better at minesweeper

      have you considered cheating

12.23.24  4:52 pm   how many chestnuts would fit in your coziest christmas sock

      i don't have any christmas socks

12.23.24  4:49 pm   im having fun

      are you sure

12.23.24  4:24 pm   whats your schedule look like lately

      just do everything constantly. keep it simple

12.23.24  3:26 pm   Hey bill, what do you think is the most important thing to keep in mind to be happy?

      there's an unlimited amount of different ways to be happy, so there is no single quintessential recipe for it
